problem: 如图,以O为圆心的两个同心圆中,大圆的弦AB与小圆相切于点C,若大圆半径为10cm,小圆半径为6cm,则弦AB的长为()
answer: 解:连接OA、OC,∵AB是小圆的切线,∴OC⊥AB,∵OA=10cm,OC=6cm,∴AC=√{OA^{2}-OC^{2}}=√{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8cm,∵AB是大圆的弦,OC过圆心,OC⊥AB,∴AB=2AC=2×8=16cm．
comment: 考查了切线的性质,解答此题的关键是连接OA、OC,构造出直角三角形,利用切线的性质及勾股定理解答．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, among the two concentric circles with O as the center, the chord AB of the great circle is tangent to the small circle at vertex C. If the radius of the great circle is N_0 and the radius of the small circle is N_1, the length of the chord AB is ()
